alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 01 at 2:31AM MST until December 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches possible, namely for the northern portion of the zone, near Bondurant. Winds could gust 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday through 11 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind will create hazardous travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning, which is also when the highest snow rates are expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches around Pinedale.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
